assistant: GitHub Copilot is an AI-powered development assistant that provides code suggestions as you type, helping developers write code more efficiently. It leverages machine learning trained on billions of lines of public code on GitHub to help complete functions, fix bugs, or suggest better ways to write code in popular programming languages such as Python, JavaScript, Ruby, Go, and others.
